name: Blood Bubble's Pants
description:
My submission for game jam 84 "Bubbles"

__________________________________________________________________________________________

                                                                            Controls:

Skills:                                                                                                                          Moving:

Left Click three times for  combo.                                                             W-A-S-D

Right Click for Reflect.

Q for Tornado.

E for dash.

___________________________________________________________________________________________

The game is not finished yet, some animations are not there, 

and there aren't any sounds.

___________________________________________________________________________________________

                                                                                  Note:

both HTML5 and the downloadable version "Blood Bubble's Pants D" have latest update for game.

The downloadable version "Blood Bubble's Pants Uncomplete" is unplayaple, it is what the game was  when the game jam submmision time ends.
